scripts.build-wasm-bindgen: yarn build-wasm && wasm-bindgen src/rust-wasi-example/target/wasm32-wasi/release/wasi-example.wasm --browser --out-dir . && yarn wbg-to-wasi && mv *.wasm public/wasm/ && mv wasi-* src
scripts.dev-wasm-bindgen: yarn dev-wasm && wasm-bindgen src/rust-wasi-example/target/wasm32-wasi/debug/wasi-example.wasm --debug --keep-debug  --out-dir . && yarn wbg-to-wasi && mv *.wasm public/wasm/ && mv wasi-* src
scripts.watch-wasm-bindgen: while true ; do inotifywait -qm --event modify @src/rust-wasi-example/target -r --format '' src/rust-wasi-example/ | yarn dev-wasm-bindgen; done
